did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Arbitration Board 282 Employees' and Carriers' Exhibits and Interpretations, 1963
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Exhibits, transcripts, and interpretations of Arbitration Board No. 282 in the dispute between the B.L.E. and the Union Railroad.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Arbitration Board 282 Employees' and Carriers' Exhibits and Interpretations #5526. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Unnumbered exhibits not entered as evidence. [folder 1 of 2]
Unnumbered exhibits not entered as evidence. [folder 2 of 2]

did.unittitle: Special appearance by Chairman of General Committee of Adjustment of the B.L.E. on the Union Railroad

scopecontent.p: Bargaining agent for employees belonging to Division 700 of the B.L.E., to deny jurisdiction of Board over their dispute with the Union Railroad and to petition for dismissal of said dispute from the Board's proceedings.

did.unittitle: Testimony of Witnesses for the B.L.F.&E.

scopecontent.p: Before the Committee on Commerce, United States Senate.

did.unittitle: Index to the testimony of the Carriers' Witnesses and their exhibits.
Before the Arbitration Board 282-BRT Question No. 36 and statement of position with appendix.
Questions and answers before Arbitration Board 282.
Reference Book Award of Arbitration Board 282.
National Joint Board created under Award of Arbitration Board 282A.
Timekeeping Arbitration Board Established by Joint Resolution of Congress
Pay Structure Study, Railroad Operating Employees

scopecontent.p: Appendix Volume II to the Report of the Commission.
